node.title: Queenslanders in for a brief reprieve before more flooding set to hit sodden southern Queensland
node.alt: Crews mop up a muddy home
node.description: As floodwaters recede and residents across southern Queensland clean up, the weather bureau warnsÂ isolated storms across already sodden catchment areas could lead to more flooding next week.
node.content:
["As floodwaters recede and southern Queensland residents in\u00a0Inglewood, Yelarbon and Texas start the clean-up, the Bureau of Meteorology (BOM) has warned isolated storms across already sodden catchment areas could lead to more flooding next week.", "Inglewood newsagent\u00a0Trisha-Lee Christy\u00a0said she was asleep at 10pm on Tuesday when her daughter woke her and told her they needed to evacuate.", "She said she felt devastated when she saw the damage to her business and home.", "\"I am just trying to think of the positive aspects of things that weren't damaged. Things that were saveable,\" Ms Christy said.", "\"I have the shop and a residence at the back area adjoining and my daughter lives right at the back in another area.", "", "
Inglewood newsagent\u00a0Trisha-Lee Christy says the flooding left her shop and home sodden.(ABC News: Ashleigh Stevenson)
", "Ms Christy said the local community and SES had been wonderful in rallying people to help.", "\"We've probably had 30 to 35 people here today helping us,\" she said.", "\"It is a beautiful community Inglewood. I just love it here \u2026 and when you have something this devastating happen as well, that is when you realise just how special they are.\"", "Supermarket operator\u00a0Kim Rush\u00a0said it was hard to survey the extent of the damage to her shop but suspected\u00a0fridge motors had blown.", "\"We have been so busy getting the dirt out that I haven't really gauged the tally of the equipment lost,\" Ms Rush said.", "", "
The clean-up operation continues at this\u00a0supermarket\u00a0after the deluge.(ABC News: Georgie Hewson)
", "Ms Rush said local police officers helped her get access back to her store, which she hoped would be open again soon.", "\"We've all got the same mess, some more than others. We will get through it,\"\u00a0she said.", "
Brief weekend reprieve before more rain\u00a0
", "BOM meteorologist\u00a0Pieter Classen\u00a0said many parts of south-east Queensland received more than 200 millimetres of rain in the past few days.", "He said the Greater Brisbane region could see flash flooding early next week.", "Mr Classen said Queensland recorded its wettest November since 2010, while Australia recorded its wettest November on record.", "\"Thankfully, we will see a bit of a reprieve over the weekend,\" he said.", "\"Much quieter conditions are forecast at least until the start of the weekend and we will actually see some sun over the next few days.", "\"We do see a bit of a deterioration potentially towards the end of the weekend again over southern parts of Queensland where catchments are very saturated at the moment.\"", "Mr Classen said the most rainfall that had fallen over the last three days was at Mount Glorious in the Moreton Bay Region, which received more than 250mm\u00a0of rain.", "\"Parts of the south-east were generally average, sort of around 80 to 100mms of rainfall for the entire month of November,\" he said.", "Senior flood forecaster Andy Barnes said major flood warnings remain in place for the Macinytre, Dumaresq, Condamine, Balonne and Upper Dawson rivers.\u00a0", "He said floodwaters peaked at about 8.7 metres at the Dumaresq River at Texas on Thursday morning.", "He said the Condamine-Balonne River system will remain on the BOM's radar for the next week.", "\"We've got major flooding between Pratten and Condamine and that's extending further downstream into the Balonne system and that is a very slow responding river that is quite long,\" he said.", "\"In time, St George will probably become of interest as well.\"", "
River yet to reach peak at Goondiwindi
", "Goondiwindi Mayor Lawrence Springborg said the water had\u00a0peaked around Yelarbon and was not\u00a0likely to pose a further threat over the next 24 hours.", "He said around 40 residents of Yelarbon who evacuated to Goondiwindi have not been able to return home and are likely to be stuck for the next couple of days.", "", "
Goondiwindi Mayor Lawrence Springborg says authorities had little time to respond to evacuation orders in Inglewood.(ABC News: Stephen Cavenagh)
", "Mr\u00a0Springborg\u00a0said floodwaters had also peaked in Texas, without any homes being actively inundated.", "He said floodwaters were likely to peak in the Macintyre River at Goondiwindi on Friday afternoon.", "\"If there's any rainfall after that it takes a significant period of time to get through this community and down to there, so the fact that we've actually had a chance for the rivers to peak and start to dissipate buys us some degree of capacity if we get more rainfall next weekend.", "\"We just say to people we need to plan, we need a state of readiness and we need to be prepared to react.\"", "Mr Springborg said the council did not expect the situation to be so dire in the town of\u00a0Inglewood on the day residents were evacuated.", "\"We had little notice. We had about an hour's notice,\" he said.", "\"At eight o'clock we were told that there was\u00a0far more water coming out of the dam than what they thought and then we got that out immediately to the people.", "\"Then the emergency response people, the police started door knocking. So not much time.", "\"We need to actually look at making sure that there is better intelligence with regards to water going into our dam and what is coming out of our dam.\""]
